newsitem.title: USA: BEFORE THE BELL - Intel,TCI rise.
newsitem.headline: BEFORE THE BELL - Intel,TCI rise.

text.p: Shares of Intel Corp and Tele-Communications Inc edged higher on Monday in pre-opening trading.

Intel rose slightly from its Friday close of 156-3/8, traders said, after a Donaldson Lufkin & Jenrette analyst raised his profit estimates for the semiconductor chip maker. The analyst expects 1997 earnings of $8.50 a share, up from his prior estimate of $7.60, according to market sources.

TCI shares rose 1/4 to 14-1/8, traders said, after a USA Today aricle said the relinquishment of the president's post by chief executive John Malone could be a signal that a takeover or sell-off is in the works.
Traders said Adobe Systems Inc also moved higher, to 37-3/8 from its Friday close of 36-1/2 and Cisco Systems fell to 62 from its close of 65-1/8.
